## ReadableLiquity.getONEUBalance() method

Get the amount of ONEU held by an address.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose balance should be retrieved. |
